testcase.purpose: Check if tizen notification work well on homescreen.

step.expected: "Notification Unit Tester" displayed on the screen.

step.step_desc: Fill Message-Title and Message-Content(i.e. Message-Title="Title" Message-Content="Content" ), then click "Send" button.
step.expected: A notification with the Message-Title and Message-Content displayed on the screen like "1 Title : Content".
The Message List should be empty.
